{{Infobox dungeon |name = Hall of Origin |image = [[File:Hall of Origin.png|200px]] |caption = A map of Hall of Origin |tokens = 106,500 |location = East of Route 208, just above the middle of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Hall of Origin''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 2,253,000 |- | Boss || 8,000,000 |- | Arceus || 10,000,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Slowpoke * Spearow * Garchomp * Slakoth * Eevee * Breloom * Absol * Arceus (normal) (boss) * Slaking (boss) * Snorlax (boss) * Shuckle (boss) * Blissey (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
